title: Kwad Racer Drone
summaries: The Kwad Racer Drone is a Hardmode, post-Plantera novelty item purchased from the Cyborg for 10 GC. Pressing the ⚒ Use / Attack button while selected in the hotbar summons a harmless drone that can be controlled by the ▲ Up, ◀ Left, and ▶ Right buttons. Pressing ⚒ Use / Attack again or switching to another item instantly destroys the drone. The player appears to wield a remote control when the drone is in use.
The player is locked in place while the drone is active. Equipping the <linked>FPV Goggles</linked> will center the camera on the drone.

statistics.Tooltip:
